title: Can we have a SOLO queue?
body:
Sick of this duo crap every single game my team has the crappy duo that act so good then proceed to feed hard and blame everyone.

I'd love if we could have a REAL solo queue.

replies.body: dude I used to duo with an adc we would destroy bot lane yes you get some bad 1s just deal with it

I don't mid playing with duo in my lobby but so many of the duos think that they are entitled to roles because "we are pre made and will carry you scrubs". It is also really annoying because my two best roles are Supp/ADC and if I am not last pick I am definitely gonna try and go for one of those (less chance of feeding, less chance of flame). Then the duo will probably get angry, start abusing in the pre game lobby, can't mute them until in game and by then the amygdala is triggering the hypothalamic pituitary adrenal axis, making me go on tilt.
Truth be told, bronze silver and even gold, the MAJORITY of duos I've come across are hella bad, so there's a bit of a stigma against them now

> [{quoted}](name=Wiggy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gljXFrWe,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-11T19:11:05.014+0000)
>
> Truth be told, bronze silver and even gold, the MAJORITY of duos I've come across are hella bad, so there's a bit of a stigma against them now

yer I notice that too lol. But whenever I duo with my friend in rank we tend to destroy them.
When I was duoing last season I wouldn't tell anyone because they'd expect me to go bad because of this :|
